values.description: KMS key for Terraform remote state encryption
No inbound; allow all egress (via NAT)
values.name: custom-alpine-terraform-dev-runner-sg

after.description: KMS key for Terraform remote state encryption
No inbound; allow all egress (via NAT)
after.name: custom-alpine-terraform-dev-runner-sg

ecr_repository_url.description: ECR repository URL to push the tooling image to.

ecs_cluster_arn.description: ECS cluster ARN for the runner.

ecs_task_definition_arn.description: ECS task definition ARN for the runner.

github_actions_role_arn.description: IAM role ARN for GitHub Actions (OIDC) to assume for pushing to ECR.

lambda_trigger_name.description: Lambda function name that triggers ECS RunTask.

tf_lock_table.description: DynamoDB table for Terraform state locking.

tf_state_bucket.description: S3 bucket for Terraform remote state.

description.constant_value: KMS key for Terraform remote state encryption
No inbound; allow all egress (via NAT)

az_count.description: Number of AZs to use (2 recommended).

ecr_image_tag.description: Default image tag used by the ECS task definition.

ecr_lifecycle_keep_last.description: How many images to keep in ECR.

ecr_repository_name.description: ECR repository name to store the tooling image.

enable_eventbridge_schedule.description: Whether to create an EventBridge schedule to trigger the runner.

enable_nat_gateway.description: Whether to create a NAT gateway for private subnets egress.

eventbridge_schedule_expression.description: EventBridge schedule expression (e.g., rate(1 day) or cron(...)).

github_branch.description: Branch allowed to assume the GitHub Actions role.

github_org.description: GitHub organization or user that owns the repository.

project_name.description: Project/name prefix used for resource naming.

runner_command.description: Command array for the ECS task. Defaults to a no-op tail to keep container alive. Override to run terraform/tf-migrate.

state_bucket_name.description: Optional explicit name for the Terraform state S3 bucket. If null, a unique name is generated.

tags.description: Additional tags to apply to all resources.
